com.conorthomason.garageapp

Class TimeControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.conorthomason.garageapp.TimeControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TimeControl
extends java.lang.Thread
    TimeControl is intended to be used primarily for the receipt/ticket classes. By using multithreading, a multiplier can be enforced, creating significantly larger time increments. These are then used for cost calculations.
    See Also:
    Java source code

      Nested Classes

      (package private) static class  TimeControl.Time
      Time is essentially the backend for TimeControl - it handles the thread operations.
